text: Arau naraisakalara majata tomalokara adhikarabhukta dasira bahirae anara bibaha bandhanata thaka tiraotasakala tomalokara babe nisid'dha karaa haiche, tomalokara babe e'ibora allahara bidhana. Ullekhita naraisakalara bahirae an'ya naraisakalaka dhana-sampadara binimayata bibaha karaa tomalokara babe baidha karaa haiche, abaidha yauna samparkara babe nahaya. Sihamtara majata yisakalara lagata tomaloke sambhoga karaicha sihamtaka sihamtara nirdharaita mohara arpana karaiba. Mohara nirdharanara pichata tomaloke kono (kama-bechi karaara) bisayata paraspara sahamata haâ€™le tata tomalokara kono dosa na'i. Niscaya allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya
